name: Promotion Class: Titan
description:
Role: Melee Damage

A furious berserker who becomes deadlier when focusing their attention on bleeding opponents.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +150
Critical Strike +6%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Whirlwind: Now grants a stacking buff per hit that increases Fury regeneration and Whirlwind damage.
Neck Slash: Now enabled on Gore, Colossus Smash, Net Pull, and Cross Gashes.
Berserk: Now heals per second damage taken, deals all damage when crash happens, you cannot drop below 1 Health.  Gain damage bonus every second for damage dealth.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Titan promotion class and prevents access to the Battle Rager and Conqueror promotion classes.
